author: Brian Fung, CNN Business
title: Russian internet users are learning to beat Putin's internet crackdown
description: A digital Iron Curtain may be descending on Russia, as President Vladimir Putin struggles to control the narrative about his war in Ukraine. The Kremlin has already moved to block Facebook and Twitter, and its latest step in that direction came Friday as the …
